[Source]

    # File lib/google_map.rb, line 10
10:   def initialize(options = {})
11:     self.dom_id = 'google_map'
12:     self.markers = []
13:     self.controls = [ :zoom, :overview, :scale, :type ]
14:     options.each_pair { |key, value| send("#{key}=", value) }
15:   end

Public Instance methods

center_on_markers_function_js()

Creates a JS function that centers the map on its markers.

[Source]

     # File lib/google_map.rb, line 134
134:   def center_on_markers_function_js
135:     return "#{dom_id}.setCenter(new GLatLng(0, 0), 0);" if markers.size == 0
136: 
137:     for marker in markers
138:       min_lat = marker.lat if !min_lat or marker.lat < min_lat
139:       max_lat = marker.lat if !max_lat or marker.lat > max_lat
140:       min_lng = marker.lng if !min_lng or marker.lng < min_lng
141:       max_lng = marker.lng if !max_lng or marker.lng > max_lng
142:     end
143: 
144:     if self.zoom
145:       zoom_js = zoom
146:     else
147:       bounds_js = "new GLatLngBounds(new GLatLng(#{min_lat}, #{min_lng}), new GLatLng(#{max_lat}, #{max_lng}))"
148:       zoom_js = "#{dom_id}.getBoundsZoomLevel(#{bounds_js})"
149:     end
150:     
151:     center_js = "new GLatLng(#{(min_lat + max_lat) / 2}, #{(min_lng + max_lng) / 2})"
152:     set_center_js = "#{dom_id}.setCenter(#{center_js}, #{zoom_js});"
153:     
154:     return "function center_#{dom_id}() {\n  #{check_resize_js}\n  #{set_center_js}\n}"
155:   end

controls_js()

[Source]

     # File lib/google_map.rb, line 85
 85:   def controls_js
 86:     js = []
 87:     
 88:     controls.each do |control|
 89:       case control
 90:         when :large, :small, :overview
 91:           c = "G#{control.to_s.capitalize}MapControl"
 92:         when :scale
 93:           c = "GScaleControl"
 94:         when :type
 95:           c = "GMapTypeControl"
 96:         when :zoom
 97:           c = "GSmallZoomControl"
 98:       end
 99:       js << "#{dom_id}.addControl(new #{c}());"
100:     end
101:     
102:     return js.join("\n")
103:   end
div(width = '100%', height = '100%')

[Source]

     # File lib/google_map.rb, line 165
165:   def div(width = '100%', height = '100%')
166:     "<div id='#{dom_id}' style='width: #{width}; height: #{height}'></div>"
167:   end
markers_functions_js()

[Source]

     # File lib/google_map.rb, line 105
105:   def markers_functions_js
106:     js = []
107:     
108:     for marker in markers
109:       js << marker.open_info_window_function
110:     end
111:     
112:     return js.join("\n")
113:   end
markers_icons_js()

[Source]

     # File lib/google_map.rb, line 115
115:   def markers_icons_js
116:     icons = []
117:     
118:     for marker in markers
119:       if marker.icon and !icons.include?(marker.icon)
120:         icons << marker.icon 
121:       end
122:     end
123:     
124:     js = []
125:     
126:     for icon in icons
127:       js << icon.to_js
128:     end
129:     
130:     return js.join("\n")
131:   end
to_html()

[Source]

    # File lib/google_map.rb, line 17
17:   def to_html
18:     html = []
19:     
20:     html << "<script src='http://maps.google.com/maps?file=api&amp;v=2&amp;key=#{GOOGLE_APPLICATION_ID}' type='text/javascript'></script>"
21:     
22:     html << "<script type=\"text/javascript\">\n/* <![CDATA[ */\n"  
23:     html << to_js
24:     html << "/* ]]> */</script> "
25:     
26:     return html.join("\n")
27:   end
to_js()

[Source]

    # File lib/google_map.rb, line 29
29:   def to_js
30:     js = []
31:     
32:     # Initialise the map variable so that it can externally accessed.
33:     js << "var #{dom_id};"
34:     markers.each { |marker| js << "var #{marker.dom_id};" }
35:     
36:     js << markers_functions_js
37:     
38:     js << center_on_markers_function_js
39:     
40:     js << "function initialize_google_map_#{dom_id}() {"
41:     js << "  if(GBrowserIsCompatible()) {"
42:     js << "    #{dom_id} = new GMap2(document.getElementById('#{dom_id}'));"
43:     
44:     js << '    ' + controls_js
45:     
46:     js << '    ' + center_on_markers_js
47:     
48:     js << '    ' + markers_icons_js
49:     
50:     # Put all the markers on the map.
51:     for marker in markers
52:       js << '    ' + marker.to_js
53:       js << ''
54:     end
55:     
56:     js << '    ' + inject_on_load.gsub("\n", "    \n") if inject_on_load
57:     
58:     js << "  }"
59:     js << "}"
60:     
61:     # Load the map on window load preserving anything already on window.onload.
62:     js << "if (typeof window.onload != 'function') {"
63:     js << "  window.onload = initialize_google_map_#{dom_id};"
64:     js << "} else {"
65:     js << "  old_before_google_map_#{dom_id} = window.onload;"
66:     js << "  window.onload = function() {" 
67:     js << "    old_before_google_map_#{dom_id}();"
68:     js << "    initialize_google_map_#{dom_id}();" 
69:     js << "  }"
70:     js << "}"
71:     # Unload the map on window load preserving anything already on window.onunload.
72:     #js << "if (typeof window.onunload != 'function') {"
73:     #js << "  window.onunload = GUnload();"
74:     #js << "} else {"
75:     #js << "  old_before_onunload = window.onload;"
76:     #js << "  window.onunload = function() {" 
77:     #js << "    old_before_onunload;"
78:     #js << "    GUnload();" 
79:     #js << "  }"
80:     #js << "}"
81:         
82:     return js.join("\n")
83:   end
